summary: This bill, the Advisory Committee on the Records of Congress Sunset Act, aims to sunset the Advisory Committee on the Records of Congress. It amends Title 44 of the United States Code, removing the relevant chapter and associated table of sections. The bill mandates annual reports from the Director of the Center for Legislative Archives on the management and preservation of congressional records, to be submitted to various officials and committees. The Archivist, Secretary, and Clerk are also required to meet to review the process after the Director submits the reports.
